column5: Hey all, heading up to the cottage next weekend.  Just wondering if anyone is familiar with the Utterson area?  Cottage is on Mainhood Lake.  Decent fishing for LMB and some perch, though I mainly seem to catch bass there.  Had some great fun fishing bass on Fish Lake in Novar in the past.  Not looking for your "honey holes" , just looking for some general guidelines to expand my repertoire.  Limited of course by the fact that we don't have a boat (YET).  Looking to rectify that fact for next year though, so anyone looking to get rid of a light-weight tinny let me know! Thanks guys, and tight lines!
